abstract.para: Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.79.1 release.

section.title: Release Notes: snapshot
section.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.79.1 release.

section.title: Gentext
section.para: The following changes have been made to the gentext code since the 1.79.1 release.

screen.phrase: Adjust URLs to refer to new CDN.
Clean up build and revision control logic.
fold last SVN changes into github
